InstalledItem.Description:

Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd.
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

With more than enough get up and go to handle your vehicle’s daily energy needs, the Radix from Lightning Power Ltd. is a power plant you can count on to get you where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: Frost-Star SL
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Whether cruising across the ground or sailing through space, there’s a J-Span cooler perfect for you. The Frost-Star SL is a mid-tier cooler designed to bring the line’s reliability to ground and open-canopy vehicles.

InstalledItem.Name: PIN
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

With the PIN vehicle shield generator you can now trust Seal Corp to protect you whether you’re in space or atmosphere.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: P8-SC SMG
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: SMG
Class: Ballistic

Magazine Size: 45
Rate Of Fire: 800 rpm
Effective Range: 30 m

Attachments: Optics (S1), Barrel (S1), Underbarrel (S1)

When the top fighting force in the universe chooses a weapon as their standard, it pays to stand up and take notice. The Behring-crafted P8-SC has been the ballistic submachine gun of choice for the UEE Marines since it first came off the production line, but since then, many have come to rely on this weapon for their own personal safety and protection.

InstalledItem.Name: P8-SC SMG Magazine (45 cap)
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Magazine
Capacity: 45

This magazine for the Behring P8-SC SMG holds forty-five 10mm rounds.

InstalledItem.Name: P4-AR Rifle
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Assault Rifle
Class: Ballistic

Magazine Size: 30
Rate Of Fire: 550 rpm
Effective Range: 50 m

Attachments: Optics (S2), Barrel (S2), Underbarrel (S2)

Behring's classic P4-AR rifle features a collapsible stock and shortened barrel, making it an ideal choice for close-quarter firefights. Its accuracy and general ease of use make it universally valued among security, military and civilian users.

InstalledItem.Name: P4-AR Magazine (30 cap)
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Magazine
Capacity: 30

This magazine for the Behring P4-AR rifle holds thirty 5.56mm cartridges.
